Articles.Content: yeah. still things are falling trough the terrain, still its wobbling... the worse is when you switch to a part crashed on landing and it start to fall into the mun or kerbin and because it is moving you cant even switch to something else. its such a showstopper at least for me... terrains would need some love for sure

It's a glitch, yes, but it's kind of low-priority compared with things like

.
